## IEventOptions type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type IEventOptions = {
    eventIngestionConfig?: {
        deliveryIntervalMs?: number;
        retryIntervalMs?: number;
        maxRetryDelayMs?: number;
        maxRetries?: number;
        batchSize?: number;
        maxQueueSize?: number;
    };
};
```
